where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( mi <* mapped_item | ( mi \ representation_item . name = '3d positioned stratum shape in interconnect module' ) and not ( 'layered_interconnect_module_3d_design_mim.' + 'axis2_placement_3d' in typeof ( mi . mapping_target ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( mi <* mapped_item | ( mi \ representation_item . name = 'stratum surface in stratum 3d position' ) and not ( 'layered_interconnect_module_3d_design_mim.' + 'axis2_placement_3d' in typeof ( mi . mapping_target ) ) ) ) = 0
